title: Brain Research Apprenticeships in New York at Columbia (BRAINYAC)

title: Multigenerational Persistence of Environmental Exposure
explanation: The term "underprivileged communities" is used in the context of public policy, environmental justice, and addressing inequalities faced by specific groups, indicating a social and political context.
